abstract.text: A view controller that displays the current maneuver instruction as a “banner” flush with the edges of the
containing view. The user swipes to one side to preview a subsequent maneuver.
A navigation component is a member of the navigation UI view hierarchy that responds as the user progresses along a
route.

protocol defines a method that allows an object to customize presented visual
instructions.
